lyrics.lyric: I can’t believe I’m working for one of the Wings now!
I’ve finished the management training, but I still haven’t got the hang of it.
Why is everyone telling me to be careful around an abnormality? How dangerous are they?
I just hope the work isn’t too difficult.
I can't even imagine the experience the manager have had to be where he is now.
I can proudly tell people now that I have joined the Wing.
The smoother the work is, the faster we finish.
Let us keep the steam up for another day.
Let’s do this!
So, we need to satisfy abnormalities’ desires such as hunger with instinct work.
We’ve made it until now. Let’s keep it that way.
Even someone from the Outskirt is here, too. What’s wrong with the employment directives?
What’s up with the chip in our armbands?
The guy I saw was replaced by someone else before I knew it.
We need to analyze abnormalities by insight work and create the environment that they favor.
The directive that forces us to do whatever the order is too harsh, I think.
If I work hard here, I can bring my family to the Nest.
I know there are sinister rumors about the Wings, but I have no choice. The pay is just too good, and everyone looks up to you.
I can’t believe we can actually communicate with abnormalities.
Perhaps we can befriend abnormalities?
I like the facility here, but the air is too heavy.
I feel like being watched.
Repression work, a work that repress everything that can erupt…
The facility and its hallways are branded with fear and despair.
Abnormalities are dangerous than I thought.
I can’t believe people can die this easily.
This is the true face of Lobotomy…
I thought I will never win against an abnormality back then, but I feel like I can now.
This is better than whatever happens in the Backalley in night.
You just need to go with the flow of the body and mind when using a weapon.
The definition of “food” is pretty ambiguous when they’re for abnormalities.
The abnormalities like something else other than food.
We can’t always be gloomy. Let’s keep our strength up!
Is this happening in other wings…?
I thought Lobotomy Corp was just a eco-friendly energy producer...
There are something off about this place.
This is way too inefficient. Why do these dangerous beings need to be managed by humans?
It takes more than mere knowledge to analyze abnormalities.
I wish I could get the hang of it already.
Not all abnormalities are bad…
I’m starting to see what’s the good way to handle the abnormalities.
They say, “Never get personally attached to abnormalities”, but…
The equipment here is fascinating… I feel nostalgic about them.
I wonder how everyone else is feeling about working in this place.
Something in my heart wavers every time I do repression work.
I feel like everything here is happening with a purpose.
New guys have no idea what they will face here.
I need to endure this. They give out vacations to the employees who worked for 2 months.
I heard rumors about monsters in the Backalley in night. They sound awfully like abnormalities.
If I die, I am just replaced by someone else…
As bitter it is, but I’m getting accustomed to the life here.
This is better than dying off in the Backalley, though.
I can eat after seeing corpses now.
I hate myself for being used to deaths.
The type of “food” is different by the type of abnormalities..
The stench of blood still lingers in my nose. It doesn’t get washed away in water.
Is this really worth it?
I saw what happens when a person goes insane.
What if abnormalities are something like gods?
The more I know about the abnormalities by insight work, the more information that I can’t understand.
I hate them. They ruthlessly murder us, but we have to take care of them. How unfair is that?
Do not get personally attached to an abnormality, even if you’re doing attachment work.
They are so picky about the games.
Friends are meaningless here. However, you can’t go through a day without comrades beside you.
I feel like I’ve woken up after a long slumber sometimes
It feels like being in a dream whenever facing an abnormality.
We need to know what they are and repress them.
It feels like the souls of the dead still remain here.
I wonder how many rookies will die
Whatever you say, manager.
Don’t get too serious about this.
I’ll buy W corporation’s travel package in my next vacation.
If I work a bit harder, my family can come to the Nest.
It’s not so different. Suppressing abnormalities, killing panicked employees.
I hope the work finishes soon.
I miss the smell of blood.
Eating is the only joy we can find here.
A human mind is too fragile.
You should not try to understand things that can’t be understood.
We will lose our humanity some day if we continue to work here.
Some people just have to do what they’re told not to.
Everyone has their own business.
Let’s go easy. Don’t overthink things.
Just relax and work. Everything will work out.
Don’t get too nervous. We can solve this one by one.
The essence of repression work is connected to the subject’s purpose of existence.
We are all equal in the face of death.
Our souls will flow through the world even if we lose our bodies.
Everyone dies someday.
SSDD, we just follow orders.
There’s not much of meaning in this. We work, and we get paid. That’s all.
Don’t worry even if you’re new here. You’ll get used to it in no time.
Don’t think too much about the people who died. Just accept the fact.
We’re nothing but blood and flesh, after all.
Blood gracefully flows in every life.
The purpose of instinct work is merely keeping them in a physical form.
The life is a beautiful flame for it is weak, yet intense.
We must do what we can do now, not later.
What is humanity, after all? Is it humane to seek truth?
We must see things beyond what we can see.
Everyone has their own mission to prove their existence.
We recreate the world by seeing the truth with the eye of wisdom.
Humans, abnormalities, it’s not important. What’s really important is the resonation of existence.
I can at least protect others.
A relationship is a chorus that blooms from the contact between beings.
Shells are just shells. We must not forget what’s beneath them.
If we can become one and share our existence, it’d be fascinating.
Death is not the end of everything.
Life is beautiful because it shines through the darkness of the night like stars.
The setting of stars is magnificent to see.
The true nature of repression work is the denial of purpose of existence.
We will come again after death, as our souls will guide us...
Abnormalities have souls, just like humans...
Please give orders! Please give orders! Please give orders! Please give orders! Please give orders!
LET ME GO HOME! I WANT TO GO HOME!
Manager, please do something about this situation if you’re seeing this! HELP ME!
AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHHHHHHHHHHHH!!
I don’t want to die alone…
Yeah, it’s your fault! YOU MESSED UP EVERYTHING!
You’re the one to blame! Not me!
It’s my fault. It’s my responsibility.
I don’t see any hope in this situation.
Even if I survive, I will suffer from this moment for the rest of my life.
Help me! I want to get out of here, open the emergency door!
Manager, open the emergency door! LET ME OUT!
I’m scared. Everyone’s dead. What should I do?
Look, manager! I have not failed!
I am not like these idiots around me! LOOK WHAT I DO!
What’s with the long face? Just wait, I’ll make you happy!
Just be gone! This company, us, you, BE GONE!
I can do this. I can kill humans like they did.
YOU HAVE ABANDONED ME!!!
The hallway is splashed with blood and brain fluid…… You can see it, too, right? We need to clean it…
I saw my dead colleague yesterday. We had dinner and coffee together. He seemed alright. I might go visit him soon.
We’re all going to die. They will ravage our body and mind in this miserable place!
I DON’T WANT TO DIE! I DON’T WANT TO GET KILLED LIKE THEM!
HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!!!
DON’T SEND ME IN THERE!!!! DON’T KILL ME!!!
IwanttoapologizetomydeadfriendsIamnotmeanttodielikethisImissmyparentssomuchnow
Let me show you my imaginary friends! They asked me, screaming that they want to get out!
DIE! DIE DIE DIE!
The smell of blood calls out to me. I want blood and flesh.
I will kill everyone. I will destroy everything. There’s no meaning in anything, after all.
I hear someone. It’s the sound of home. I can’t stop hearing it.
There’s no hope. My mind collapses. Everything collapses.
We will all sink and be devoured by madness.
I can’t. I tried to get used to it. BUT I CAN’T!
Please let me out of here. I tried. But I can’t take it anymore!
We don’t want to die like this. We’re not here to die like this.
Let us seek peace from them.
I’m sorry, friend. I will free you now.
Come out, everyone! Come out and free us from this accursed place!
It’s going to be fun. The melody of ripping flesh!
Why do humans die so easily? Like you.
It’s going to end quickly. I will free you from the prison of flesh.
The whispers of the moon and the sound of stars. The truth beyond…
To the horizon of knowledge, beyond the understanding…
Their roar. The resonation between you and me. The incandescent wisdom…
I will never get out of here.
We will eventually become one in the source.
Losing sanity is the only redemption here.
We will find our redemption through abnormalities.
Abnormalities are the true origin of humans. Let us reach and find redemption.
Let us reach the paradise beyond death, together with abnormalities.
It’s nothing.
I can still do this.
Piece of cake.
It only tickles
Boring.
It doesn’t even tickle me.
Let’s calm down. As we always do.
Just don’t lose your mind and keep to the manual.
Let’s just do as we’ve been always doing.
Let’s just don’t get careless.
Focus…
I’m getting nervous.
Slowly, slowly…
Breathe in, breathe out…
Let’s just keep to the manual.
It will be fine if we focus, I think…
I can’t make a mistake here…
My legs are trembling…
Damn, it’s scary.
It’s sending chills down my spine.
Please, nothing happens…
GOD DAMN IT!!!
What should we do?
What should we do in this situation?
My body doesn’t move…
Help…
I don’t want to die!
I need to run away...
*gasps*
What…
What have I seen…?
I can’t take it…
I can’t understand…
Everything has stopped…
This is god…
My existence is meaningless…
We are petty beings…
All-mighty existence beyond the realm of beings…
Mercy…
Grant us salvation…
I was nothing, after all…
Let us watch in awe…
Another guy kicks the bucket.
Poor bastard.
We don’t have time to grief for them.
It happens all the time.
Those who will die, will die.
Weakling.
I will pay respect, at least.
Let us pay respect…
Another employee dies.
I need to get used to deaths..
We can’t let grief hold us.
I wonder if there’s anyone who will cry for them.
Damn it, someone died.
Friendly down!
He’s gone…
We lost one. Be careful!
Let’s focus. I can’t die…
{0}… Are you really dead?
I can’t believe you’ve died like this.
I can’t let them kill me, too.
Please, please, please…
Is {0} really dead? Is it my turn?
By the gods…
I relied on that person…
What I we do…?
If even {0} is dead…
I’m dead now. Even {0} has died like that…
I am done.
I can’t believe that person died.
WE WILL ALL DIE!
Employee {0} has died, I will not be different.
Another one goes insane.
Heart is easily breakable.
Weak minded have no place here.
The sound of despair, I’m used to it.
Even the screams delight me now.
I thought I was going to go crazy back then whenever I saw something like that. But now…
It will be quiet again after a while.
Another one that lost heart.
I can’t become like him.
I’m getting used to seeing the face of insanity.
The screams of the mad always disturb me.
Will I lose my mind like them some day?
We have a panicked!
Someone just reached the maximum mental contamination level!
I can’t lose my mind.
I need to keep the tension here… I can’t lose my mind.
It’s painful to watch. It will make me go insane.
I don’t want to hear those screams of pain.
Even the ones with higher rank goes insane.
I don’t know if I can endure the madness of this place.
Please don’t give up on your mind.
Please come back!
What have you seen?
{0}, please, get back…
The higher ranks go crazy, too…
How long will I endure this madness?
Nobody's safe in this place.
What has driven that person insane?
Employee {0}… Maximum mental contamination level… oh god…
Madness rules this place…
{0}…not you… you were supposed to protect us…
THAT PERSON WILL KILL US ALL! THIS PLACE WILL BE THE HELL FOR US!
WE WILL ALL GO MAD AND DIE LIKE THAT EMPLOYEE!!
There’s no hope in this place… everyone will eventually go crazy…
It will only be a matter of time before I go insane like employee {0}…

unit.lyric: It’s good for you to laugh. So, laugh!
HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!
Smile from ear to ear! Like this!
A shepherd tends to the sheep to take wool and meat. It’s just like what we do.
Things like this happen too often in the world. Even among the people.
But those are not sheep. That’s for certain.
Where…where is my pills?
I wish I could go home in time today…
No! I didn’t say anything, manager!
Whatever.
I’m trying my best.
Annoying…
I’m craving strawberry cake.
What day is it today? I forgot it again.
What am I supposed to do again? Oh, yeah.
I’m doing this for money, not because I enjoy it.
This job is such a pain in the neck.
I really need to quit this job.
God, I don’t want to do anything.
I wonder how many will die today.
Perhaps I will die too, very soon.
I should make a lucky charm for everyone. I’m going to secretly put them onto people!
It’s an abnormality observation report, this one too…. oh, here it is! The employee observation report!
I’m supposed to spend breaktime doing things that are good for me. So, I guess it’s okay to spy on people to check if they’re okay because it comforts me…?
*sigh* There’s not a single handsome guy here…
I want to work little and earn a lot.
I wish I get to work on a cute abnormality, if that’s possible.
Night time overwork again, great.
I want to go home.
Ah…I don’t wanna do it.
I want to see more abnormalities when I promote! I can do that, right?
I feel like I should be treated better!
My friends and family are going to be super surprised when they hear that I’m working here. Hehe!
Oh, sorry. What can I help you?
I'm planning to have spaghetti for dinner.
Always stay focused. You never know what would happen.
SMILE! SMILE! SMILE!
It was…better in my old days…. Guards! GUAAAAAAAAARDS!
YAY! OVERWORK AGAIN!
Going to graduate school was my biggest mistake!
It’s not a bunny! I’m not going to do it!
SHOULD HAVE QUIT A LONG TIME AGO! AAAAAAAAAAAAAA!
I don’t want to die!
No…everyone will die…! Just like him…!
Oh, heavens! Somebody, help us!
I never should have come here in the first place. I was a fool…. I want to go home. I want to go home, please…
AHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!! I never felt any better!!!
Hey, buddy. Are you smiling like a good boy?
These…damned things…
I’m not home yet!
Work never ends, huh….
That’s a bunny… That’s a fluffy cute bunny…
It’s all over now.
We’re done for.
Have you lost something dear to you, too…?
Wow, how marvelous! I want to touch it♡♡♡
Wow! Maybe we can be friends?
…Okay, here goes nothing.
…. I can’t see your smile anymore.
I told you that they are not sheep nor hunting dogs…
I, I need to get out of here!
I didn’t get my degrees for this!
Are, are you dead? Seriously? I don’t know anything!
We are all going to die…
I might have ended up like that if I were a bit late…
…. I thought I could protect this time.
I’m not going to die until I meet a handsome guy.
I, I know I will end up just like that someday…but this….
This is why I don't make promises.
Just smile, friend! It will calm you down.
Get out of my face, you piece of crap.
O, overtime again?
Somebody, stop him!
Again? I guess I’m the only sane one here.
Huh? What’s going on? I feel like I should run.
Let’s take care of that idiot before things go out of control.
I wish I could calm you down…
Wake up! What happened to you?
I can’t believe people can turn like that… I’m not sure I will be fine….
This is much more sadder than I expected.
